Modification_Detail.description: Per "Guide toPDS4 Context Products" v1.3, - changed all lidvid_reference to lid_reference - changed target LIDs to new formation rule
extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model
Updated schema version. Adding missing "instrument" references. Adding missing "agency" references. Description updated.

Investigation.name: EPOXI
Investigation.description: "EPOXI" is the moniket assigned to the two extended missions for the Deep Impact spacecraft: the Extrasolar Planet Observation and Characterization (EPOCh) Mission, and the Deep Impact Extended Investigation (DIXI) mission. As part of the DIXI mission, the spacecraft flew by Comet 103P/Hartley 2. As part of the EPOCh mission, the spacecraft used the larger of its two telescopes to find extrasolar planets using the transit method.
